FuncDef: This command displays information on static IGMP snooping source groups for the VPLS service.

ParaDef.Info: Displays static IGMP snooping source groups for a specific SAP.
Displays the IGMP snooping source groups for a specific spoke or mesh SDP. Values-1 to 17407.
The virtual circuit ID on the SDP ID for which to display information. Values-1 to 4294967295. ParamDefault: Default- For mesh SDPs only, all VC IDs
